spart2: mAmakAH pANdavAH ca eva kim akurvawa saFjaya..

spart1: xqRtvA wu pANdava-anIkam vyUDam xuryoXanaH waxA.
paSya ewAm pANdu-puwrANAm AcArya mahawIm camUm.

spart2: yuyuXAnaH virAtaH ca xrupaxaH ca mahAn-raWaH..
purujiw kunwiBojaH ca SEbyaH ca nara-pufgavaH..

spart1: yuXAmanyuH ca vikrAnwaH uwwama-ojAH ca vIryavAn.
spart2: sOBaxraH xrOpaxeyAH ca sarve eva mahAn-raWAH..

spart1: asmAkam wu viSiRtAH ye wAn niboXa xvija-uwwama.
spart2: nAyakAH mama sEnyasya saFjFA-arWam wAn bravImi we..

spart1: BavAn BIRmaH ca karNaH ca kqpaH ca samiwiFjayaH.
spart2: aSvawWAmA vikarNaH ca sOmaxawwiH waWA eva ca..

spart1: anye ca bahavaH SUrAH maw-arWe wyakwa-jIviwAH.

spart2: paryApwam wu ixam eweRAm balam BIma-aBirakRiwam..
BIRmam eva aBirakRanwu BavanwaH sarve eva hi..
siMha-nAxam vinaxya uccEH SafKam xaXmO prawApavAn..

spart1: wawaH SafKAH ca BeryaH ca paNavAnaka-gomuKAH.
spart2: sahasA eva aByahanyanwa saH SabxaH wumulaH aBavaw..

spart1: wawaH SvewEH hayEH yukwe mahawi syanxane sWiwO.
spart2: mAXavaH pANdavaH ca eva xivyO SafKO praxaXmawuH..

spart1: kASyaH ca parama-iSvAsaH SiKaNdI ca mahAn-raWaH.
spart2: XqRtaxyumnaH virAtaH ca sAwyakiH ca aparAjiwaH..
sOBaxraH ca mahA-bAhuH SafKAn xaXmuH pqWak pqWak..
naBaH ca pqWivIm ca eva wumulaH vyanunAxayan..

spart1: hqRIkeSam waxA vAkyam ixam Aha mahI-pawe.
spart2: senayoH uBayoH maXye raWam sWApaya me acyuwa..

spart1: yAvaw ewAn nirIkRe aham yoxXu-kAmAn avasWiwAn.
spart2: kEH mayA saha yoxXavyam asmin raNa-samuxyame..

spart1: yowsyamAnAn avekRe aham ye ewe awra samAgawAH.

spart2: uvAca pArWa paSya ewAn samavewAn kurUn iwi..

spart1: wawra apaSyaw sWiwAn pArWaH piwQn aWa piwAmahAn.
spart2: AcAryAn mAwulAn BrAwQn puwrAn pOwrAn saKIn waWA..

spart1: SvaSurAn suhqxaH ca eva senayoH uBayoH api.
spart2: wAn samIkRya sa kOnweyaH sarvAn banXUn avasWiwAn..

spart1: kqpayA parayA AviRtaH viRIxan ixam abravIw.
spart2: xqRtvA imam sva-janam kqRNa yuyuwsum samupasWiwam..

spart1: sIxanwi mama gAwrANi muKam ca pariSuRyawi.
spart2: vepaWuH ca SarIre me roma-harRaH ca jAyawe..

spart1: gANdIvam sraMsawe haswAw wvak ca eva parixahyawe.
spart2: na ca Saknomi avasWAwum Bramawi iva ca me manaH..
na ca SreyaH anupaSyAmi hawvA sva-janam Ahave..

spart1: na kAfkRe vijayam kqRNa na ca rAjyam suKAni ca.
spart2: kim naH rAjyena govinxa kim BogEH jIviwena vA..

spart1: yeRAm arWe kAfkRiwam naH rAjyam BogAH suKAni ca.
spart2: we ime avasWiwAH yuxXe prANAn wyakwvA XanAni ca..

spart1: AcAryAH piwaraH puwrAH waWA eva ca piwAmahAH.
spart2: mAwulAH SvaSurAH pOwrAH SyAlAH sambanXinaH waWA..

spart1: ewAn na hanwum icCAmi GnawaH api maXusUxana.
spart2: api wrElokya-rAjasya hewoH kim nu mahI-kqwe..

spart1: nihawya XArwarARtrAn naH kA prIwiH syAw janArxana.
spart2: pApam eva ASrayew asmAn hawvA ewAn AwawAyinaH..

spart1: wasmAw na arhAH vayam hanwum XArwarARtrAn sva-bAnXavAn.
spart2: sva-janam hi kaWam hawvA suKinaH syAma mAXava..

spart1: kaWam na jFeyam asmABiH pApAw asmAw nivarwiwum.

spart2: Xarme naRte kulam kqwsnam a-XarmaH aBiBavawi uwa..

spart1: safkaraH narakAya eva kulaGnAnAm kulasya ca.

spart2: narake a-niyawam vAsaH Bavawi iwi anuSuSruma..

spart1: aho bawa mahaw-pApam karwum vyavasiwAH vayam.

spart2: XArwarARtrAH raNe hanyuH waw me kRema-waram Bavew..

spart1: evam ukwvA arjunaH safKye raWa-upasWe upAviSaw.
klEbyaM mA sma gamaH pArWa nEwawwvayyupapaxyawe
gurUnahawvA hi mahAnuBAvAn Sreyo BokwumBEkRyamapIha loke.
na cEwaxvixmaH kawaranno garIyaH yawvA jayema yaxi vA no jayeyuH.
spart2: yAneva hawvA na jijIviRAmaH wevasWiwAH pramuKe XArwarARtrAH..
yacCreyaH syAnniSciwambrUhi wanme SiRyaswehaM SAXi mAnwvAmprapannam..
na yowsya iwi govinxamukwvA wURNImbaBUva ha..

spart1: na wvevAhaM jAwu nAsaM na wvaM neme janAXipAH
spart2: na cEva na BaviRyAmaH sarve vayamawaH param..

spart1: nAsawo vixyawe BAvo nABAvo vixyawe sawaH
ya enaM vewwi hanwAraM yaScEnam manyawe hawam
spart2: uBO wO na vijAnIwo nAyaM hanwi na hanyawe..

spart1: na jAyawe mriyawe vA kaxAciw nAyam BUwvABaviwA vA na BUyaH.
spart2: ajo niwyaH SASvawoyaM purANaH na hanyawe hanyamAne SarIre..
kaWaM sa puruRaH pArWa kafGAwayawi hanwi kam..

spart1: vAsAMsi jIrNAni yaWA vihAya navAni gqhNAwi naroparANi.
spart2: waWA SarIrANi vihAya jIrNAni anyAni saMyAwi navAni xehI..

spart1: nEnam Cinxanwi SaswrANi nEnam xahawi pAvakaH
spart2: na cEnam klexayanwyApaH na SoRayawi mAruwaH..
waWApi wvaM mahAbAho nEvaM Sociwum arhasi..

spart1: jAwasya hi Xruvo mqwyurXruvaFjanma mqwasya ca

spart2: AScaryavaccEnamanyaH SrqNowi SruwvApyenaM vexa na cEva kaSciw..
wasmAwsarvANi BUwAni na wvaM Sociwum arhasi..

spart1: hawo vA prApsyasi svargaFjiwvA vA BokRyase mahIm
eRA weBihiwA sAMKye buxXiryoge wvimAM SrqNu
spart2: buxXyA yukwo yayA pArWa karmabanXam prahAsyasi..

spart1: yogasWaH kuru karmANi safgam wyakwvA XanaFjaya
spart2: sixXyasixXyoH samo BUwvA samawvaM yoga ucyawe..
wasmAx yogAya yujyasva yogaH karmasu kOSalam..
waxA ganwAsi nirvexaM Srowavyasya Sruwasya ca..
nABinanxawi na xveRti wasya prajFA prawiRTiwA..

spart1: wAni sarvANi saMyamya yukwa AsIwa mawparaH
spart2: vaSe hi yasyenxriyANi wasya prajFA prawiRTiwA..
yasyAFjAgrawi BUwAni sA niSA paSyawo muneH..
waxvawkAmA yampraviSanwi sarve sa SAnwimApnowi na kAmakAmI..

spart1: eRA brAhmI sWiwiH pArWa nEnAM prApya vimuhyawi

spart2: waw kiM karmaNi Gore mAM niyojayasi keSava..

spart1: lokesmin xviviXA niRTA purA prokwA mayAnaGa
karmenxriyANi saMyamya ya Aswe manasA smaran
niyawafkuru karma wvam karma jyAyo hyakarmaNaH

spart2: wErxawwAnapraxAyEByo yo Bufkwe swena eva saH..
BuFjawe we wvaGam pApA ye pacanwyAwmakAraNAw..
Awmanyeva ca sanwuRtaswasya kAryam na vixyawe..

spart1: na me pArWAswi karwavyanwriRu lokeRu kiFcana
yaxi hyaham na varweyam jAwu karmaNyawanxriwaH

spart2: guNA guNeRu varwanwa iwi mawvA na sajjawe..
manasaswu parA buxXiryo buxXeH parawaswu saH..
sa kAleneha mahawA yogo naRtaH paranwapa..

spart1: sa evAyaM mayA wexya yogaH prokwaH purAwanaH
spart2: Bakwosi me saKA cewi rahasyaM hyewaxuwwamam..

spart1: bahUni me vyawIwAni janmAni wava cArjuna
spart2: wAnyahaM vexa sarvANi na wvaM vewWa paranwapa..

spart1: yaxA yaxA hi Xarmasya glAnirBavawi BArawa
janma karma ca me xivyamevaM yo vewwi wawwvawaH
kAfkRanwaH karmaNAM sixXiM yajanwa iha xevawAH
spart2: kRipraM hi mAnuRe loke sixXirBavawi karmajA..

spart1: na mAfkarmANi limpanwi na me karmaPale spqhA
spart2: iwi mAM yoBijAnAwi karmaBir na sa baXyawe..

spart1: karmaNyakarma yaH paSyexakarmaNi ca karma yaH

spart2: samaH sixXAvasixXO ca kqwvApi na nibaXyawe..
nAyaM lokoswi na paro na suKaM saMSayAwmanaH..

spart1: sannyAsam karmaNAm kqRNa punaH yogam ca SaMsasi.
spart2: yaw SreyaH ewayoH ekam waw me brUhi suniSciwam..

spart1: jFeyaH saH niwya-sannyAsI yaH na xveRti na kAfkRawi.
spart2: nir-xvanxvaH hi mahA-bAho suKam banXAw pramucyawe..
ekam api AsWiwaH samyak uBayoH vinxawe Palam..

spart1: yaw sAfKyEH prApyawe sWAnam waw yogEH api gamyawe.
spart2: ekam sAfKyam ca yogam ca yaH paSyawi saH paSyawi..

spart1: sannyAsaH wu mahA-bAho xuHKam Apwum a-yogawaH.
na eva kiFciw karomi iwi yukwaH manyewa wawwva-viw.
spart2: paSyan SrqNvan spqSan jiGran aSnan gacCan svapan Svasan..

spart1: pralapan visqjan gqhNan unmiRan nimiRan api.
brahmaNi AXAya karmANi safgam wyakwvA karowi yaH.
spart2: lipyawe na saH pApena paxma-pawram iva amBasA..

spart1: kAyena manasA buxXyA kevalEH inxriyEH api.
spart2: yoginaH karma kurvanwi safgam wyakwvA Awma-SuxXaye..

spart1: yukwaH karma-Palam wyakwvA SAnwim Apnowi nERTikIm.
sarva-karmANi manasA sannyasya Aswe suKam vaSI.
spart2: nava-xvAre pure xehI na eva kurvan na kArayan..

spart1: na karwqwvam na karmANi lokasya sqjawi praBuH.
na Axawwe kasyaciw pApam na ca eva sukqwam viBuH.
spart2: a-jFAnena Avqwam jFAnam wena muhyanwi janwavaH..

spart1: jFAnena wu waw a-jFAnam yeRAm nASiwam AwmanaH.

spart2: Suni ca eva SvapAke ca paNdiwAH sama-xarSinaH..

spart1: iha eva wEH jiwaH sargaH yeRAm sAmye sWiwam manaH.
spart2: nir-xoRam hi samam brahma wasmAw brahmaNi we sWiwAH..

spart1: na prahqRyew priyam prApya na uxvijew prApya ca a-priyam.
bAhya-sparSeRu a-sakwa-AwmA vinxawi Awmani yaw suKam.
ye hi saMsparSa-jAH BogAH xuHKa-yonayaH eva we.
spart2: Axi-anwa-vanwaH kOnweya na weRu ramawe buXaH..

spart1: Saknowi iha eva yaH soDum prAk SarIra-vi-mokRaNAw.
spart2: kAma-kroXa-uxBavam vegam saH yukwaH saH suKI naraH..

spart1: yaH anwa-suKaH anwa-ArAmaH waWA anwa-jyowiH eva yaH.
sparSAn kqwvA bahiH bAhyAn cakRuH ca eva anware BruvoH.

spart2: vigawa-icCA-Baya-kroXaH yaH saxA mukwaH eva saH..
suhqxam sarva-BUwAnAm jFAwvA mAm SAnwim qcCawi..

spart1: an-ASriwaH karma-Palam kAryam karma karowi yaH.
spart2: sa: sannyAsI ca yogI ca na nir-agniH na ca a-kriyaH..

spart1: yam sannyAsam iwi prAhuH yogam wam vixXi pANdava.
spart2: na hi a-sannyaswa-safkalpaH yogI Bavawi kaScana..

spart1: ArurukRoH muneH yogam karma kAraNam ucyawe.
spart2: yoga-ArUDasya wasya eva SamaH kAraNam ucyawe..

spart1: yaxA hi na inxriya-arWeRu na karmasu anuRajjawe.
uxXarew AwmanA AwmAnam na AwmAnam avasAxayew.
spart2: AwmA eva hi AwmanaH banXuH AwmA eva ripuH AwmanaH..

spart1: banXuH AwmA AwmanaH wasya yena AwmA eva AwmanA jiwaH.
spart2: an-AwmanaH wu Sawruwve varwewa AwmA eva Sawru-vaw..
sAXuRu api ca pApeRu sama-buxXiH viSiRyawe..

spart1: yogI yuFjIwa sawawam AwmAnam rahasi sWiwaH.
SucO xeSe prawiRTApya sWiram Asanam AwmanaH.

spart2: samprekRya nAsikA-agram svam xiSaH ca an-avalokayan..
manaH saMyamya maw-ciwwaH yukwaH AsIwa maw-paraH..

spart1: yuFjan evam saxA AwmAnam yogI niyawa-mAnasaH.
na awi aSnawaH wu yogaH aswi na ca ekAnwam an-aSnawaH.
spart2: na ca awi svapna-SIlasya jAgrawaH na eva ca arjuna..

spart1: yaxA viniyawam ciwwam Awmani eva avawiRTawe.
spart2: nis-spqhaH sarva-kAmeByaH yukwaH iwi ucyawe waxA..

spart1: yaWA xIpaH ni-vAwa-sWaH na ifgawe sA upamA smqwA.

spart2: yawra ca eva AwmanA AwmAnam paSyan Awmani wuRyawi..

spart1: suKam Awyanwikam yaw waw buxXi-grAhyam awi-inxriyam.
spart2: vewwi yawra na ca eva ayam sWiwaH calawi wawwvawaH..

spart1: yam labXvA ca a-param lABam manyawe na aXikam wawaH.
spart2: yasmin sWiwaH na xuHKena guruNA api vicAlyawe..
Awma-saMsWam manaH kqwvA na kiFciw api cinwayew..

spart1: yawaH yawaH nis-carawi manaH caFcalam a-sWiram.
spart2: wawaH wawaH niyamya ewaw Awmani eva vaSam nayew..

spart1: praSAnwa-manasam hi enam yoginam suKam uwwamam.
yuFjan evam saxA AwmAnam yogI vigawa-kalmaRaH.
yaH mAm paSyawi sarvawra sarvam ca mayi paSyawi.
spart2: wasya aham na praNaSyAmi saH ca me na praNaSyawi..

spart1: sarva-BUwa-sWiwam yaH mAm Bajawi ekawvam AsWiwaH.
spart2: sarvaWA varwamAnaH api saH yogI mayi varwawe..

spart1: AwmA-Opamyena sarvawra samam paSyawi yaH arjuna.
spart2: suKam vA yaxi vA xuHKam saH yogI paramaH mawaH..

spart1: yaH ayam yogaH wvayA prokwaH sAmyena maXusUxana.
spart2: ewasya aham na paSyAmi caFcalawvAw sWiwim sWirAm..

spart1: caFcalam hi manaH kqRNa pramAWi balavaw xqDam.
spart2: wasya aham nigraham manye vAyoH iva su-xuRkaram..
aByAsena wu kOnweya vErAgyeNa ca gqhyawe..

spart1: asaMyawAw-AwmanA yogaH xus-prApaH iwi me mawiH.
spart2: vaSyAw-AwmanA wu yawawA SakyaH avApwum upAyawaH..
a-prApya yoga-saMsixXim kAm gawim kqRNa gacCawi..

spart1: kacciw na uBaya-viBraRtaH Cinna-aBram iva naSyawi.
ewaw me saMSayam kqRNa Cewwum arhasi a-SeRawaH.
spart2: wvaw-anyaH saMSayasya asya CewwA na hi upapaxyawe..

spart1: pArWa na eva iha na amuwra vinASaH wasya vixyawe.
spart2: na hi kalyANa-kqw kaSciw xur-gawim wAwa gacCawi..

spart1: prApya puNya-kqwAm lokAn uRiwvA SASvawIH samAH.
aWavA yoginAm eva kule Bavawi XImawAm.
spart2: ewaw hi xurlaBa-waram loke janma yaw IxqSam..
yawawe ca wawaH BUyaH saMsixXO kuru-nanxana..

spart1: pUrva-aByAsena wena eva hriyawe hi avaSaH api saH.
wapasviByaH aXikaH yogI jFAniByaH api mawaH aXikaH.
spart2: karmiByaH ca aXikaH yogI wasmAw yogI Bava arjuna..
SraxXAvAn Bajawe yaH mAm saH me yukwawamaH mawaH..
asaMSayaM samagraM mAM yaWA jFAsyasi wacCqNu..
mayi sarvamixaM prowaM sUwre maNigaNA iva..

spart1: bIjaM mAM sarvaBUwAnAM vixXi pArWa sanAwanam
ye cEva sAwwvikA BAvA rAjasAswAmasASca ye
spart2: mawwa evewi wAnvixXi na wvahaM weRu we mayi..

spart1: xEvI hi eRA guNamayI mama mAyA xurawyayA
spart2: mAmeva ye prapaxyanwe mAyAmewAM waranwi we..

spart1: na mAM xuRkqwino mUDAH prapaxyanwe narAXamAH

spart2: priyo hi jFAninowyarWamahaM sa ca mama priyaH..

spart1: uxArAH sarva evEwe jFAnI wvAwmEva me mawam

spart2: waM waM niyamamAsWAya prakqwyA niyawAH svayA..

spart1: yo yo yAM yAM wanuM BakwaH SraxXayArciwumicCawi

spart2: laBawe ca wawaH kAmAn mayEva vihiwAnhi wAn..
BaviRyANi ca BUwAni mAM wu vexa na kaScana..
we brahma waxvixuH kqwsnamaXyAwmaM karma cAKilam..

spart1: kiM waxbrahma kimaXyAwmaM kiM karma puruRowwama
anwakAle ca mAmeva smaran mukwvA kalevaram
spart2: yaH prayAwi sa maxBAvaM yAwi nAswyawra saMSayaH..

spart1: prayANakAle manasAcalena BakwyA yukwo yogabalena cEva.
spart2: BruvormaXye prANamAveSya samyak sa wamparampuruRamupEwi xivyam..

spart1: yaxakRaraM vexavixo vaxanwi viSanwi yaxyawayo vIwarAgAH.
spart2: yaxicCanwo brahmacaryaFcaranwi wawwe paxaM safgraheNa pravakRye..

spart1: sarvaxvArANi saMyamya mano hqxi niruXya ca

spart2: yaH prayAwi wyajanxehaM sa yAwi paramAfgawim..

spart1: ananyacewAH sawawaM yo mAM smarawi niwyaSaH

spart2: mAmupewya wu kOnweya punarjanma na vixyawe..
yaH sa sarveRu BUweRu naSyawsu na vinaSyawi..
yaM prApya na nivarwanwe waxXAma paramAmmama..

spart1: puruRaH saH paraH pArWa BakwyA laByaswvananyayA

spart2: wawra prayAwA gacCanwi brahma brahmavixo janAH..

spart1: SuklakqRNe gawI hyewe jagawaH SASvawe mawe
nEwe sqwI pArWa jAnanyogI muhyawi kaScana
vexeRu yajFeRu wapaHsu cEva xAneRu yawpuNyaPalampraxiRtam.
spart2: awyewi wawsarvamixaM vixiwvA yogI paraM sWAnamupEwi cAxyam..

spart1: na ca mawsWAni BUwAni paSya me yogamESvaram
na ca mAM wAni karmANi nibaXnanwi XanaFjaya
gawirBarwA praBuH sAkRI nivAsaH SaraNaM suhqw
wrEvixyA mAM somapAH pUwapAPAH yajFEriRtvA svargawiM prArWayanwe.
spart2: we puNyamAsAxya surenxralokam aSnanwi xivyAnxivi xevaBogAn..

spart1: we waM BukwvA svargalokaM viSAlam kRINe puNye marwyalokaM viSanwi.
aham hi sarvayajFAnAm BokwA ca praBureva ca

spart2: BUwAni yAnwi BUwejyA yAnwi maxyAjinopi mAm..

spart1: pawraM puRpaM PalaM woyaM yo me BakwyA prayacCawi
samohaM sarvaBUweRu na me xveRyoswi na priyaH
spart2: ye Bajanwi wu mAM BakwyA mayi we weRu cApyaham..
sAXureva sa manwavyaH samyagvyavasiwo hi saH..
kOnweya prawijAnIhi na me BakwaH praNaSyawi..

spart1: mAM hi pArWa vyapASriwya yepi syuH pApayonayaH
spart2: swriyo vESyAswaWA SUxrAswepi yAnwi parAM gawim..

spart1: manmanA Bava maxBakwo maxyAjI mAM namaskuru
BUya eva mahAbAho SqNu me paramaM vacaH
na me vixuH suragaNAH praBavaM na maharRayaH

spart2: suKaM xuHKaM BavoBAvo BayaM cABayameva ca..
Bavanwi BAvA BUwAnAM mawwa eva pqWagviXAH..
maxBAvA mAnasA jAwA yeRAM loka imAH prajAH..

spart1: ewAM viBUwiM yogaM ca mama yaH vewwi wawwvawaH
ahaM sarvasya praBavo mawwaH sarvaM pravarwawe
spart2: iwi mawvA Bajanwe mAM buXAH BAvasamanviwAh..
kaWayanwaSca mAM niwyaM wuRyanwi ca ramanwi ca..
xaxAmi buxXiyogaM waM yena mAmupayAnwi we..

spart1: paraM brahma paraM XAma paviwraM paramaM BavAn

spart2: asiwo xevalo vyAsaH svayaM cEva bravIRi me..
na hi we BagavanvyakwiM vixurxevA na xAnavAH..
keRu keRu ca BAveRu cinwyosi BagavanmayA..
BUyaH kaWaya wqpwirhi SqNvawo nAswi memqwam..
ahamAxiSca maXyaM ca BUwAnAmanwa eva ca..

spart1: puroXasAM ca muKyaM mAM vixXi pArWa bqhaspawim

spart2: kIrwiH SrIrvAkca nArINAM smqwirmeXA XqwiH kRamA..
na waxaswi vinA yawsyAnmayA BUwaM carAcaram..

spart1: BavApyayO hi BUwAnAM SruwO viswaraSo mayA
manyase yaxi wacCakyam mayA xraRtumiwi praBo
paSya me pArWa rUpANi SawaSoWa sahasraSaH
na wu mAM Sakyase xraRtumanenEva svacakRuRA
spart2: xivyaM xaxAmi we cakRuH paSya me yogamESvaram..
yaxi BAH saxqSI sA syAxBAsaswasya mahAwmanaH..

spart2: anikewaH sWira-mawiH BakwimAn me priyaH naraH..

yajjFAwvA munayaH sarve parAM sixXimiwo gawAH..

ahaM wvA sarvapApeByo mokRayiRyAmi mA SucaH..
